ValidationRule.description: Requires Contract_Price_Hold_Reason field to be populated while submitting for approval.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Contract_Price_Hold_Reason__c) , ISPICKVAL( Contract_Price_Hold__c , 'Request Approval'), CASESAFEID($User.ProfileId) <> $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Integration_User_Profile__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in Contract price hold reason before submitting for price hold approval.
